dct_title_s: Arctic Climate System Study Historical Ice Chart Archive, 1553-2002
dct_description_sm: The ACSYS Historical Ice Chart Archive presents historical sea-ice observations in the Arctic region between 30ºW and 70ºE in the form of digitized maps, stored as shape files. The earliest chart dates from 1553, and the most recent from December 2002.
System requirements: Geographic Information Systems (GIS) software that reads ESRI shapefile format.
dct_rights_sm:
If you use this data, please refer to it using this citation:
ACSYS, 2003. ACSYS Historical Ice Chart Archive (1553-2002). IACPO Informal Report No. 8. Tromsø, Norway: Arctic Climate System Study.
